entry.tran: 安恬的;田园诗般的;质朴宜人的
entry.def: If you describe something as idyllic, you mean that it is extremely pleasant, simple, and peaceful without any difficulties or dangers.

example.ex: ...an idyllic setting for a summer romance...
example.tran: 适于夏日恋曲的质朴宜人的环境
